verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When thro’ the woods and forest glades I wander And hear the birds sing sweetly in the trees, When I look down from lofty mountain grandeur, And hear the brook and feel the gentle breeze;{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When Christ shall come with shouts of acclamation And take me home, what joy shall fill my heart! Then I shall bow in humble adoration And there proclaim; my God, how great Thou art!{/lang-eng}
